name: Labyrinth Game
description:
Over 650000 players enjoyed Labyrinth Game!!!
Featured as NO 1 Paid App in Puzzle category.

Classic labyrinth game where you control the ball while avoiding holes and traps to reach the destination.

65 Gorgeous looking levels with challenging puzzles to solve. Beat the gold time to get Gold cups for every level.

Calibrate and play the way you hold your device.

Features:
● 65 beautiful Levels.
● Realistic Physics.
● 15 Balls to choose from.
● Achievements to unlock.
